textAfterTable: This class can be used to let the user browse and pick images stored in the server. It uses an AJAX based user interface to avoid page reloading when the browsing display is updated. Required external javascripts: prototype.js, scriptaculous library (scriptaculous.js,unittest.js,effects.js)
